main event: A bright, stationary light with a distinct outline, approximately 15-20 ft. in diameter, was observed hovering and then rapidly disappearing out of sight.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, stationary light with a distinct outline, apparently hovering.
The object remained stationary for a short period and then disappeared rapidly out of sight.
The witness estimated the object to be approximately 15-20 ft. in diameter.
The object was observed in the presence of a jet aircraft, which was used as a reference point for estimating the object's altitude.
The object was observed for a total duration of 45 minutes, during which it hovered and then went into a rapid climb, disappearing from sight.
sighted object: a bright, stationary light with a distinct outline
witnesses: Mrs. W., a 55-year-old housewife, and her 10-year-old son, as well as two dock workers
